channel.title: Education System in India: Read experts opinion and academic research on matters related to education policy in India | Hindustan Times
channel.description: Education in India: Read opinion articles and in-depth analysis on issues related to the Education System in India on Hindustan Times. Know from the experts on various matters like education policy, skill development, learning, literacy, education system, research, higher education, education for all, education leadership, teachers, education institutes, smart learning, digital learning, primary education, language proficiency and many more.
